answers.answer: I took mine yesterday. Man was that nasty! I felt queasy for the first 30 minutes or so and was pretty ok after that. Fingers crossed for both of us!
I passed by a lot and wasn't sick at all.
I never got sick from them just slightly queasy. Passed them fine. Like comment above, everyone reacts different.
I got really sick after and I didnt pass, but I took the 3hr test and I passed & did not get sick just tired
i did bought and i wasn't sick at all, but now i have gestacional diabetes and strict diet and glucose test 4 times a day
I didnt pass and was exhausted and nauseous all day
I felt sick and i failed. So everybody's different

question: I just took my hour test. I hear that you get really sick after if you pass. But I feel semi okay, so does that mean I failed?
title: glucose test?!?
